SubRoutine.SubRoutineName: Settings. IF YOU TOUCH ME, I'LL GET MAD!

Settings.Name: Train Skinning plus Leatherworking
Settings.Summary: Allows you to train Skinning and gathering Stuff to get Leatherworking up to 1-525

Settings.Name: Train Mining plus Blacksmithing
Settings.Summary: Will mine the mats you need to skill up.
